projects.title: MyFonts by Monotype
projects.description: Web application for browsing and purchasing fonts from a global font marketplace. Topics covered include React, Styled Components, user authentication flows, and advanced search and filter experiences using Algolia.

projects.title: UPS Enterprise Web Portal
projects.description: Web portal for handling logistics operations and shipment management at UPS. Topics covered include React and Angular development, reusable UI components, complex UI states, performance optimization, and cross-team collaboration.
